title: Lost Souls: The First Book of the Apocalypse
description: Contains blood, guts, torture, a little heart, and mystery.Tafaydia meets her fate when she has a gruesome encounter with the zombies. She discovers her Haven is not as secure as the oppressive officials want her to believe. She realizes she must escape with her adopted twins. Taffy is thrown into a world she does not know, everyone she knows either undead or or treacherous scum. Her whole world is shattered when her twins are swept from her in a bout of chaos. Now she has to toughen up just to survive in the new world.
author: Kya Aliana
